short_summary: Contractor to provide English general/technical writing and editing services.
description: The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) is seeking to issue a contract for a Contractor to provide English general/technical writing and editing services. The PHAC is seeking two (2) Senior Technical Writers to perform the work on a monthly basis. The work to be conducted is detailed in Annex A, Statement of Work. The contract period will start at contract award and end April 30 2023 with three (3) additional one (1) year option periods. The Contractor must be available to work off-site at their own facilities.Amendment to the RFP: the words list of suppliers and TSPS flexible grid have been removed from the RFP - Those words were not in the French version of the RFP. ALL OTHERS TERMS AND CONDITONS REMAIN UNCHANGEDDocument 1000238341_q1_a_q3_questions_and_answers has been replaced by 1000238828 Q1A1 to Q3A3.The title has been renamed but the content of the document remain unchangedAmendment November 24 : document Q4A4-Q7A7 is posted on buy and sellAmendment November 30 2022 document Q8A8-Q11A11 is posted on buy and sellAmendment December 2 2022 : document Q12A12 is posted on buy and sellLast amendment December 6 2022 document Q13A13-Q14A14 is posted of buy and sellDecember 8 2022 the Field \
